posts.post_content:
Looking for upgrades from the list shown in the photo below.  PSA 4 or better only.  PM or email (tbrambo@yahoo.com) if you have any of these you're looking to sell.  

Also happy to do a trade of mine (grade shown to the right of the need) plus cash to balance for your PSA 4 or better.  

Not interested in selling cards from the below list, either.  Just want to upgrade my set.

Thanks!

Troy Rambo
